title: Updating Pixel 2 - Manually - January 2021 Security Update
content:
Sorry if this asked been asked before, I searched through the forums but couldn't find anything. 
I am looking to manually update the latest security patch - Jan 2021 to my pixel 2. Since Google has officially stopped the support to this phone, I want to do this manually. But I am not sure if there's a patch that I can even download or use for pixel 3 or something? Any help or pointing in the right direction will be super helpful. 

I need to do this as my corporate email has stopped working, and it needs my phone to be on the latest software/security update. It's a perfectly good working phone and I hate to spend more $$ on a new phone. 

Thank you.
